title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 320.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 320.1 - General

State Regulations

Generally, except when in conflict with the statutes of
this State or with rules and regulations duly adopted by the commissioner, the
rules and regulations applicable to and in conformity with the primary
standards established by article 33 of the Environmental Conservation Law shall
be those promulgated pursuant to the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide and

Rodenticide Act, and appearing as title 40, chapter I, parts 150-189 of the

Code of Federal Regulations, in effect July 1, 1997. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
320.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
